skills.skill: Cross Collaboration with teams and KOLs

duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate new client opportunities and prepare custom tailored proposals and statements of work to meet client needs
Forecast costs processes in consultation with SMEs for new acquisitions
Evaluation of existing programs for margin and profitability assessments
Draft, review and analyze RFI and RFP documents to ensure adequate information has been provided to generate proposal and/or statements of work

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
